testcase.name: should set repository directory to rootProject dir by default
should not initialize authorization options when no flags on project
should set authorization options when custom key and password provided
should read key from file when 'release.customKeyFile' property used
should prefer explicit custom key before key read from file when both 'release.customKey*' properties used
should set username and password when provided via 'release.customUsername' and 'release.customPassword'
